long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text Conversion Tool
This Chrome extension provides a versatile set of text conversion and encoding utilities, allowing users to quickly transform text between various formats. Key features include:
Base64 Encoding/Decoding: Convert text to and from Base64 format.
HTML Encoding/Decoding: Escape or unescape HTML special characters.
URL Encoding/Decoding: Convert text to and from URL-safe format.
Unicode/ASCII Conversion: Transform text between Unicode and ASCII representations.
Hebrew-English Keyboard Layout Conversion: Switch text between Hebrew and English keyboard layouts.
Text Flipping: Reverse the order of characters in the text.
Autodetect Feature: Automatically identify the input format and suggest the appropriate conversion.
Clipboard Integration: Easily copy converted text back to the input for further transformations.
Selected Text Capture: Automatically populate the input field with text selected on the current webpage.
This tool is perfect for developers, translators, and anyone who frequently works with different text encodings. It streamlines the process of converting between various text formats, saving time and reducing errors in text manipulation tasks.
